entry.title: Photos Post 34: Special Events (after 1975), Part 19
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 5 Photos of the special event 1979-0128 Walk with Group Photos, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 5 low resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 5 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1979.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
